subject: Fix overlay/border issues, rename tabs, add aspect ratio filtering
body:
- Fix per-image overlay: Each image now has its own overlay settings
  stored on the image object instead of global state
- Fix outer border: Use separate absolute div instead of boxShadow
  on container (was being covered by children)
- Rename tabs: Templates -> Presets, Layout -> Structure
- Add aspect ratio filtering: Layout presets can be filtered by
  Square, Portrait, Landscape in the Presets tab

Technical changes:
- useAdState: Add updateImageOverlay, remove global setOverlay
- defaultImageSettings now includes overlay with opacity 0
- AdCanvas: Read overlay from imageData.overlay per-image
- AdCanvas: Outer frame now uses separate div with zIndex: 9
- layoutPresets: Add aspectRatios array to each preset
- TemplatesTab: Add aspect ratio filter buttons
title: Fix overlay/border issues, rename tabs, add aspect ratio filtering
